Package photos.controllers

Class PhotoController

java.lang.Object
photos.controllers.PhotoController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable, Screen
public class PhotoController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, Screen
Manages Photo related stuff like captions, tags, and slideshow
Author:
Ibrahim Khajanchi, Karl Sequeira
